com.eyro.cubeacon

Interface CBApp.BeaconListener

  • Enclosing class:
    CBApp

    public static interface CBApp.BeaconListener
    Abstract interface for managing beacon event like onEnter, onExit and onChange

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChange(CBBeacon old, CBBeacon current)
      Abstract function that called when beacon nearest changed
      void onEnter(CBBeacon beacon)
      Abstract function that called when beacon entered region
      void onExit(CBBeacon beacon, long timeInterval)
      Abstract function that called when beacon exited region

    • Method Detail

      • onEnter

        void onEnter(CBBeacon beacon)
        Abstract function that called when beacon entered region
        Parameters:
        beacon - Beacon that entered region

      • onExit

        void onExit(CBBeacon beacon,
            long timeInterval)
        Abstract function that called when beacon exited region
        Parameters:
        beacon - Beacon that exited region
        timeInterval - Interval of beacon from entered to exit region

      • onChange

        void onChange(CBBeacon old,
              CBBeacon current)
        Abstract function that called when beacon nearest changed
        Parameters:
        old - The old detected nearest beacon
        current - The new detected nearest beacon
